attributes.action: ban the use, sale, ownership and production of mobile telephones, excempting personnel of the Emergency Services (at least until full independent research into all health and environmental effects has been conducted and published nation-wide, if not indefinitely)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Never has the world seen so many talk so often about so little. We all managed easily without them until comparatively recently. They are increasingly used as toys not tools. 
The iresponsibible mis-selling and peer pressure to up-grade every year is both pointless, anduses unecessary damage to the environment.
There would be less crime for many reasons.
Increased socialbility and interaction of people is surely deserving of support and encouragement.
